alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 21 at 3:08AM HST until November 22 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... .A building northwest swell (310 degrees) will produce advisory level surf along western islands through early Tuesday morning. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai. * WHERE...Niihau, Kauai Southwest, Waianae Coast, Oahu North Shore, Kauai North, Molokai Windward, Molokai North and Molokai West. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
